definition: special-purpose phone line or communications link/hotline/special rail line (e.g. between airport and city)/CL:條|条[tiao2]
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: You should complete a separate application form for scheduled service(s).
sentences.chinese: 申請專線服務，必須另填表格。

sentences.english: But the musical arrangements can be quite complex.
sentences.chinese: 上海到焦作專線但是音樂的編排非常複雜。

sentences.english: Clearly, hot lines are no cure for the problem of drug abuse.
sentences.chinese: 顯然，連專線電話也無法解決“濫用麻醉品”的問題。

sentences.english: One went through the White House switchboard; the other was a private line directly to the president.
sentences.chinese: 一部連着白宮交換機，另一部是總統專線。

sentences.english: It is the use of voice-grade, two-way communication channels that distinguishes supervisory control from direct-wire remote control;
sentences.chinese: 話音級雙路通信通道的採用是監控與專線控制的區別。

sentences.english: This route is operated by Ap Lei Chau Public Light Bus Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 本線由鴨脷洲專線小巴有限公司經營。

sentences.english: And have you taken a bus tour?
sentences.chinese: 還有，你們乘專線遊覽車觀光了嗎？

sentences.english: How often does the shuttle bus run? Every ten minutes.
sentences.chinese: 專線巴士多長時間一班？每特別很是鍾。

sentences.english: Here's the Dow Jones Newswires story on the committee meeting and vote.
sentences.chinese: 這是道瓊斯新聞專線關於委員會會議和投票的報道。

sentences.english: On her arrival, Fang saw the shuttle bus which was going to take her to the university.
sentences.chinese: 一到那裏，方英甫就乘坐專線班車抵達學校。

sentences.english: EMU routing scheme is one of the basic operation plans of dedicated passenger railways.
sentences.chinese: 動車組交路計劃是客運專線的基本運營計劃之一。

sentences.english: The application of rigid frame tied-arch bridge on passenger dedicated railway is feasible.
sentences.chinese: 剛架系杆拱橋在客運專線上的應用是完全可行的。

sentences.english: Mr. Sun has his own phone.
During the construction process of high slope on the passenger railway from Wuhan to Guangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 武廣客運專線高邊坡支護中，大量使用預應力錨索。

sentences.english: You can take the special-line bus or taxi to PanZhihua airport.
sentences.chinese: 你可以坐專線車或坐出租車到攀枝花飛機場。

definition: to access/to transfer passengers between two railway lines
to transfer/to change trains, buses etc
to go nonstop to/through (as in "through train")/nonstop
"through train" (refers to the idea of retaining previous legislature after transition to Chinese rule in Hong Kong or Macao)
shuttle bus ferrying passengers between train stations on two different rail lines
to ride (in a car or carriage)/to drive/to motor
bus/abbr. for 公共汽車|公共汽车[gong1 gong4 qi4 che1]/car belonging to an organization and used by its members (government car, police car, company car etc)/abbr. for 公務用車|公务用车[gong1 wu4 yong4 che1]
